location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No 11 from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire Residency to William Newnham, Chief Secretary to the Government, Political Department, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is acknowledging the receipt of a communication (No 1363 of 1824), which instructed the Resident to provide all the assistance to Mohomed Ali Khan [Muḥammad ‘Alī Khān] for his losses in the Sherauz [Shiraz] earthquake that he sees fit. It further reports that the person in question has been provided with 3000 Bombay rupees.
